column1: #Text=" Sokka says : " You think we can outrun them ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't think it 's gon na matter !
#Text=" Aang says : " What is it , Momo ?
#Text=" Long Feng says : " I can handle you by myself .
#Text=" Aang says : " I missed you , buddy .
#Text=" Iroh says : " You did the right thing , nephew .

#Text=" Main Aang Appa Freedom Fighters ( flashback only ) Iroh Jet Katara Longshot Momo Smellerbee Sokka Toph Zuko Antagonists Dai Li Long Feng Mongke ( flashback only ) says : " Minor Joo Dee Old Sweepy Pao Quon " Toph says : " Hey !
